honest mistake period. if it was "intentionally" then yea....it's totally 
fucked up..but it's not.

A "bad judgment" is going 80 in a 65. Curtis Jackson has a repeated history 
of doing this type of thing. He is a bully and you cannot rationalize what 
he did away no matter how much you try. The dude is a 40 year old has been 
scumbag.
